english.segment1: Verse 1: Mercy, in your tender mercy. Look on me (x2). Frailty, even in my frailty. Welcome me (x2)
english.segment2: Bridge: Father this my own vocation that you would come and lead me once again
english.segment3: Chorus: Breath in me breathe of God. Mend in me this wounded heart. That I may know youve made your peace with me. Breathe in me
english.segment4: Verse 2: Burden take away this burden. Set me free (x2). Calling, I have heard you calling. Out for me you shout for me
english.segment5: Bridge 2: Father this my own vocation that you would come and lead me once again. And I know you will hear my pleading and you will find me ever once again
english.segment7: Verse 3: Empty, empty. Fill me, Father fill me. Empty. I am empty. Wont you fill me once again
